photos.title: Timeline Photos
photos.description:
Last year, my sister Christa was diagnosed with cystic fibrosis (CF). This year, on August 20, there will be a CF fundraising bicycle race in Ann Arbor â the Michigan CF Cycle for Life. 

CF is a genetic disease that affects the lungs and digestive system. There is currently a medley of treatments that target the symptoms of the disease, but there is no definitive treatment or cure. 

Christa, more than some, benefits from the drugs that are available. She herself will be riding in the Michigan Cycle for Life this August (and beating many of us), which not only speaks to her unassailable enthusiasm, but also demonstrates the potential of CF drug research. 

Because Christa is a compassionate friend, compulsive volunteer, and future physician, the number of people she will help, serve, and heal over her lifetime will inevitably exceed the number of benefactors she will have. If you would like to seize this rare chance to help a person who has devoted herself to helping others, you can donate to any of the riders on our Cycle for Life team â @[1102847763105061:274:Team Sweat Quest]. Your donation will (to Christaâs great relief) benefit not just her, but all CF patients; proceeds go to the Cystic Fibrosis Foundation. Or you can register as a rider and try to raise money for your own ride. The link to the website is below. Spread the word!

http://fightcf.cff.org/goto/teamsweatquest

photos.title: Timeline Photos
photos.description:
Last year, my sister Christa was diagnosed with cystic fibrosis (CF). This year, on August 20, there will be a CF fundraising bicycle race in Ann Arbor â the Michigan CF Cycle for Life. 

CF is a genetic disease that affects the lungs and digestive system. There is currently a medley of treatments that target the symptoms of the disease, but there is no definitive treatment or cure. All people with CF face great uncertainty. 

Christa, more than some, benefits from the drugs that are available. She herself will be riding in the Michigan Cycle for Life this August (and beating many of us), which not only speaks to her unassailable enthusiasm, but also demonstrates the potential of CF drug research. 

Because Christa is a compassionate friend, compulsive volunteer, and future physician, the number of people she will help, serve, and heal over her lifetime will inevitably exceed the number of benefactors she will have. If you would like to seize this rare chance to help a person who has devoted herself to helping others, you can donate to any of the riders on our Cycle for Life team â @[1102847763105061:274:Team Sweat Quest]. Your donation will (to Christaâs great relief) benefit not just her, but all CF patients; proceeds go to the Cystic Fibrosis Foundation. Or you can join our team as a cyclist and raise money for your ride. The link to donate or register is below. Spread the word!

http://fightcf.cff.org/goto/teamsweatquest

photos.title: Timeline Photos
photos.description: I could not be happier to announce that this caring, smart, thoughtful, strong, beautiful woman has agreed to be my wife. I have more peace every time I talk to her, more wisdom every time I listen to her, more compassion every time I watch her, and more joy every day I spend with her. I feel overwhelmingly blessed that I will have her by my side throughout this journey of life. My thanks to God, and of course to the precious woman I love, Luesoni.
